vl-ui-form-grid demo

Documentatie over grid in het algemeen.

Formulier grid

          
          <div is="vl-form-grid">
            ...
          </div>

Formulier grid met kolommen

        
          <div is="vl-form-grid">
            <div is="vl-form-column" size="4" max-size="12">
              <label is="vl-form-label" for="txt">Label dat 4/12 van de grid breedte inneemt</label>
            </div>
            <div is="vl-form-column" size="8" max-size="12">
              <input id="txt" is='vl-input-field' value="Text veld dat 8/12 van de grid breedte inneemt" block/>
            </div>
          </div>

Voorkeur formulier

        
          <form>
            <div is="vl-form-grid" is-stacked>
              <div is="vl-form-column" size="12">
                <label is="vl-form-label" for="txt1" block>Voornaam</label>
                <input id="txt1" is='vl-input-field' placeholder="Jos" block/>
              </div>
              <div is="vl-form-column" size="12">
                <label is="vl-form-label" for="txt2" block>Naam</label>
                <input id="txt2" is='vl-input-field' placeholder="Bosmans" block/>
              </div>
              <div is="vl-form-column" size="12">
                <vl-checkbox label="Ik hou van webcomponenten" checked></vl-checkbox>
              </div>
              <div is="vl-form-column" size="12">
                <label is="vl-form-label" for="txta" block>Opmerking</label>
                <textarea id="txta" is="vl-textarea" aria-label="textarea block" cols="40" rows="4" placeholder="Geen" block></textarea>
              </div>
              <div is="vl-form-column" size="12">
                <button is="vl-button">Gegevens opslaan</button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </form>
